references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This work is important because it presents Stable Video Diffusion, which directly builds upon latent video diffusion models, scaling them to large datasets, which is a core technology for video generation.

This work is important as DiT, the Diffusion Transformer, revolutionized image and video generation by replacing the traditional U-Net with a transformer-based backbone, enabling more efficient and scalable diffusion generators.

references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: This work is important as the Reangle-A-Video model builds upon CogVideoX-5b image-to-video diffusion model, and also compares against it.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This is an important paper because it introduces Latent Diffusion Models, a foundational technology that compresses images to a latent representation to reduce computational burden.

references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces ControlNet-like hypernetworks, which are relied upon to integrate additional camera control signals.
